title: fried broccoli
description: Brasied beef is flaked and layered with fried sourdough and cheese to make an oven-baked pudding.Equipment: for this recipe you will need a round, ovenproof serving dish to bake the pie in, approximately 18cm/7in in diameter and 8cm/3in deep.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz shin of beef on the bone
1 small head of garlic, cut in half
3 tbsp Dijon mustard, or English mustard if you prefer
salt and freshly ground black pepper
8 small heads of purple sprouting broccoli (approximately 300g/10½oz)
